<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get dynamic QR code by ID.</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/pix/deposits/qr-codes/dynamic/{id}"}></MethodEndpoint>



Enter the pix dynamic QR code's ID below and execute to get its state and all information.

## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Path Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"id","required":true,"in":"path","description":"Qr Code UUID.","schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Header Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"nonce","in":"header","description":"The nonce ID is a UUID (v4) used to uniquely identify the requisition. All requisitions must have an identifier.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

The PIX Qr Code Dynamic returned successfully.

ID.","example":"abf6c3c6-f54b-4fbf-83ee-75ecf5f36c66"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"txid"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Qr code txID.","example":"f6e2e084-29b9-4935-a059-5473b13033aa"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"emv"} required={true} payment."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"state"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`PENDING`, `READY`, `ERROR`]"} schemaName={"date-time"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"format":"date-time","type":"string","description":"Qr code created \"00020101021226910014br.gov.bcb.pix2569bankaddress.com.br/pix/v2/cob/8b358702141e4162bd68eedfe7fb45f4520400005303986540523.005802BR5924USER\",\n  \"expiration_date\": \"2024-03-30T10:44:29.447Z\",\n
